title: Mesh
description:
Represents a mesh to be rendered. Internally the mesh is automatically instanced for performance.

Note
Setting/modifying the geometry or topology are not currently supported, and only be configured within a GLTF (eg via blender).

properties.name: castShadow
properties.description: Whether this mesh should cast a shadow. Defaults to true.

properties.name: receiveShadow
properties.description: Whether this mesh should receive a shadow. Defaults to true.

snippets.name: Create Mesh
snippets.description: Create a mesh with default shadow settings.

snippets.name: Mesh Cast Shadow
snippets.description: Create a mesh that casts shadows.
